name: CVE-2020-8265
description: Node.js versions before 10.23.1, 12.20.1, 14.15.4, 15.5.1 are vulnerable to a use-after-free bug in its TLS implementation. When writing to a TLS enabled socket, node::StreamBase::Write calls node::TLSWrap::DoWrite with a freshly allocated WriteWrap object as first argument. If the DoWrite method does not return an error, this object is passed back to the caller as part of a StreamWriteResult structure. This may be exploited to corrupt memory leading to a Denial of Service or potentially other exploits.
pattern: [(software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:nodejs:node.js:*:*:*:*:-:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:nodejs:node.js:*:*:*:*:lts:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:nodejs:node.js:*:*:*:*:lts:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:nodejs:node.js:*:*:*:*:lts:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:debian:debian_linux:10.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:fedoraproject:fedora:32:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:fedoraproject:fedora:33:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:graalvm:19.3.4:*:*:*:enterprise:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:graalvm:20.3.0:*:*:*:enterprise:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:siemens:sinec_infrastructure_network_services:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')]
